snippet.title: Strange Brigade - Gameplay Overview | PC, PS4, Xbox One
snippet.description:
Strange Brigade, is a rip-roaring action-adventure video game to be enjoyed solo or with friends in what the boffins call “online co-op,” for 2-4 players! 

Explore ancient civilizations, uncover untold mystery and unearth astonishing artefacts BUT … it’s not all tickety-boo and afternoon tea! No, The Brigade’s primary mandate is to dispatch evil wherever it may lurk.  

Features:
- A Cracking Campaign
- Four Fearless Adventurers
- Sensational Super Powers
- Guns, Biggers Guns, and Trinkets
- Extra Modes, Extra Escapades

Pre-order your copy TODAY at https://strangebrigade.com/ and join the action on 28/08/2018!

For more updates and thrills follow us on:

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official/
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/strangebrigade/ 
Twitter https://twitter.com/StrangeBrigade
Rebellion Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion
Rebellion Game Store: https://games.rebellionstore.com/en/
